descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Asian Americans and Popular Culture. What is Asian American Popular Culture? This course will look at food, popular film, music, television, YouTube, consumer culture and print culture (zines, graphic novels and art). We will go beyond looking at tropes of the Other, the "model minority" and the mainstream's erasure of Asian American culture to explore how Asian Americans use popular culture to challenge and critique identity categories, imagine solidarities and motivate change.
